title: The Chinese Theory of Art (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
The Chinese Theory of Art
G.P Putnam's Sons | 1967 | ISBN: N/A | English | 282 pages | PDF | 36.7 MB

This volume is intended as a source book on the Chinese theory of art and as an aid to a fuller appreciation of the goal of Chinese painting and its trends and development. The main work consists of translations from the writings by Chinese artists and art critics on problems and techniques, style and taste. Through these translations Western art students will better understand what the Chinese artists were trying to do, and why and how they did it
